description: Comprehensive configuration - edit the values below directly

_usage_notes.season: Single season: '21' | Multiple seasons: ['20', '21'] | Comma-separated string: '20,21'
_usage_notes.target_machine: Single: 'AFM' | Multiple: ['AFM', 'MM'] | Auto-discover: null or 'auto' | Comma-separated: 'AFM,MM'
_usage_notes.target_venue: All venues: null | Single venue: 'TWP' | Multiple venues: ['TWP', '8BT', 'SHR']
_usage_notes.ipr_filter: Set to null for all players, or {min_ipr: X, max_ipr: Y} for skill range
_usage_notes.outlier_filter: Methods: 'percentile' (lower_percentile: 5, upper_percentile: 95), 'iqr' (iqr_multiplier: 1.5), 'absolute' (max_score: 1000000). Set to null to disable.
